ThingDef.label: butter
ThingDef.description:
A rich, creamy dairy product made by churning cream, commonly used in cooking, baking, and as a spread.

<color=#E5E54C>Trade considerations</color> (assuming dairy processing station is used):

<color=#E5E54C>Ingredients:</color> Making 20 butter requires 50 ingredients at an average of 1.1 value (55), and sells for 10, giving a <color=#33CC33>72.50%</color> profit per unit.

<color=#E5E54C>Value per work:</color> Recipe requires 5000 work, which results on a value per work of <color=#33CC33>0.04</color>.

<color=#E5E54C>Caravan trading:</color> Its weight is 0.2 Kg, for a value per Kg of <color=#33CC33>50</color>.

<color=#E5E54C>Profit per day:</color> On average, profit per day is <color=#33CC33>0.35</color> (same as Yayo).

ThingDef.label: ghee
ThingDef.description:
A clarified butter with a rich, nutty flavor, prized for its high smoke point and long shelf life.

<color=#E5E54C>Trade considerations</color> (assuming dairy processing station is used):

<color=#E5E54C>Ingredients:</color> Making 20 ghee requires 50 butter at an average of 10 value, and sells for 40, giving a <color=#33CC33>37.50%</color> profit per unit.

<color=#E5E54C>Value per work:</color> Recipe requires 5000 work, which results on a value per work of <color=#33CC33>0.16</color>.

<color=#E5E54C>Caravan trading:</color> Its weight is 0.2 Kg, for a value per Kg of <color=#33CC33>200</color>.

<color=#E5E54C>Profit per day:</color> On average, profit per day is <color=#33CC33>0.72</color>.
